title: Love Choice
description: In the not so distant future, three grounded yet supernatural teens must navigate their feelings if they hope to survive. Will Constance choose Hunter or Alastair?
quote: Constance, my cybernetic abs belong to you and you alone.
altHero: a teen girl (Constance) stands in the ruins of a city
alt1: a buff boy with a robot arm (Hunter) lifts his shirt to show neon abs
alt2: a deer boy (Alastair) in a hoodie sits on a couch in the woods with Constance
alt3: Alastair rides a stampede of deer
alt4: Hunter and Alastair chase after a crying Constance who is being carried away by giant bird talons
